project.name: C-C771A-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C771A-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive Read in a file containing a list of 10 other files. Open these files and read their contents. If these contents are purly alphanumeric, the memory gets properly free()'d, otherwise a missing reference is created.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_8 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_8 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_9 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_9 generated\n'
